text.div:
BC VerificationStatus Logical Model

Whether an assessment has been confirmed by testing or observation. CIMI Alignment: This attribute corresponds to FindingContext.status, but has been defined to align with FHIR.

name: VerificationStatus
title: BC VerificationStatus Logical Model
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC).
description:
Whether an assessment has been confirmed by testing or observation.
			
			CIMI Alignment: This attribute corresponds to FindingContext.status, but has been defined to align with FHIR.
